sub_title: An Olympian who is experienced in Digital Transformation Portfolio/Program/Project Managment>>Azure,ServiceNow/Plat4mation Expert,Agile Expert,Certified Scrum Master & Product Owner>>Lean Six Sigma GreenBelt üá©üá≤ üá≥üá±
summary:
‚ÄúThe best triple jumper in the history of the Netherlands‚Äù 

An energetic, ambitious person who has developed a mature, responsible and professional approach to any task that is presented. Multi-talented with over 15 years of experience in Finance (Banking, Digitalization, Credit & Asset Management). Promising, outstanding & professional at execution of my duties or task on hand. 

A digital banking transformation & Agile Way of Working specialist who is excellent in working with others to achieving goals on time and with accuracy. Experience in utilizing OKRs, KPIs, Milestones, Epics, Azure, ServiceNow, Jira, Agile, Scrum, LeanSix Sigma and other methods/platforms to reduce waste and increase productivity.  Highly passionate about exceeding goals. Competitive, discipline & determine to win in nature, deriving from being a College Triple Jump Champion (College Athlete), one of the best Triple Jumpers in the World (Professional Athlete) and an Olympic Athlete!

üá©üá≤ üá≥üá± üá∫üá∏

-Coach, train and conduct Global workshops for best practices in utilizing our digital reporting and operational platform -Service Now . 

-Constantly provide feedback to further perfect the platforms functionalities so that it can become more user friendly and functional for all ING users', 'title': 'Sr. Global Portfolio Analysts & Consultant', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}, {'location': None, 'date': {'start': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}, 'end': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}}, 'company': 'ING', 'description': 'Consult multiple departments/domains and countries on : Digital Process Reporting, Internal Way of Working (Agile, Lean Six Sigma, Eliminating waste while improving productivity), Utilization of Service Now as a single source of truth, Portfolio Management, Project/Program Management, Change management, OKRs, Cross/inter-Dependency management, Epics and Milestones deliverables. 
I bridge the gap between IT and Business while focusing on eliminating waste, improving productive and reducing cost (cost savings) through various process improvements techniques. This includes, tracking financials, and all deliverables promised to the bank by IT engineering teams, ensuring alignment with the milestones & expectations set by Sr. Management. 

My ultimate goal is to reduce impediments which hinder the quick delivery or Epics & Milestones set by the bank to achieve a profitable and productive year.', 'title': 'Sr. Change Portfolio Consultant/Portfolio Manager-Bank Portfolio Management', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}, {'location': None, 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}, 'end': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}}, 'company': 'ING', 'description': 'ING Unite is all about Uniting Netherlands & Belgium into one integrated banking platform to serve over 11 million ING clients and 17 million prospects. 

Some of my functions within the Unite NL+BE Transformation Office includes: 
-Bridging the gap between IT Integrators/IT Tribes & Sr Management 
-Managing our single source of truth data reporting and storage platform (Service Now)
-Managing dependencies 
-Creating new strategies on problem solving to improve the process of deliverables to Sr Management
-Implementing the Agile mindset (utilizing Scrum Master & Agile experience)
-Managing deliverables of IT Integrators/IT Tribes 
-Managing of our SharePoint 
-Managing and creating Reports to support goals set by our Programme Office
-Training Project Managers & IT Integrators/Engineers on the use of Service Now PPM 

And many more to be updated.....', 'title': 'Sr Programme Managment Officer-Central Transformation Office-Programme Office', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}, {'location': None, 'date': {'start': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}, 'end': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}}, 'company': 'ING', 'description': 'STA-My role includes supporting the Global KYC Center of Expertise organization which includes Monitoring & Screening, Due Diligence/IRP, Risk & Quality Control-RAS/SIRA & Academy, reporting directly to the Global KYC Centre of Expertise head. Support the organization in realizing large and complex changes  which bringing people together and work towards a shared vision or change target and end product. I organize alignment and help CoE team leads, Global CoE lead & the Executive Board to ensuring delivery of the services provided by the Global KYC CoE. 
Some other Key responsibilities includes: 
o    Create and setup the CoE Roadmap, manage dependencies with other KYC roadmaps (eg. Delivery tribe and Business line roadmaps) and monitor the Roadmap
o    Help build a Global CoE support team that enables to the Global CoE to deliver on its promise
o    Support the Global CoE lead with preparing presentations and standard communication towards Sr.   Management
o    Assist Global CoE in sharing one voice messaging and ensuring proper foundation of purpose, responsibilities etc are maintained at a central level
o    Act as liaison towards global KYC Communication and ensure alignment in consistent messaging around the topic of KYC
o    Organize CoE events for CoE teams and virtual communities across the Globe
o    Ensure and foster team spirit within Global CoE team as well as across the virtual communities;
o    Assist in building the virtual communities and supporting the team leads and KYC business line leads.
o Simplify The Global KYC CoE deliverables to the countries and various stakeholders;
o    Involve and align with all relevant staff necessary to organize and implement the change;
o    Help implement small change initiatives to improve delivery
o    Contribute to the ING One Agile Way of Working and safeguard the Orange Code
Knowledge and expertise required

Combine and deliver all expectations  in the most effective way as a Agile Coach & Change Professional!', 'title': 'Sr Project Manager-Global KYC CoE', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}, {'location': None, 'date': {'start': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}, 'end': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}}, 'company': 'ING', 'description': 'Global Wholesale Banking-Lending (40 Countries Worldwide)

Overcoming obstacles  particularly relating respective countries different  languages and timezone. 

Global Change Management: Creation of new projects, ideas and methodology to implement ING latest Global Framework Internationally (Over 35 Countries) to achieve Global standardization of Products, Organization, Processes, Data & IT.  This process involved connecting cross functioning teams where Business and IT can work in harmony to solve multiple impediments to help expedite the implementation of our target. 

Document Owner: Responsible for creating and maintaining all documents associated with the implementation of the target operating model (change management)in accordance to the Global Rollout (implementation) Expert Team.
